thread.title: Lovely place
thread.title_full: Lovely place - Review of River Palace Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: maprugrats
title: Lovely place
text:
We stayed for 4 nights. It's a lovely friendly hotel, where nothing is too much trouble. We are coming back in July with our daughters. They will love it aswell. The range of food for breakfast covered any taste.
Room Tip: We were on the 7th floor and the room was a bit small but had a very large comfy bed. There was also... See more room tips
